Name: QMK-152 3x Scope
Description: <color=#FF0000>Usually, the aiming view of this scope may be misaligned every time you enter the game. Remove it from the gun, then aim once with any gun that doesn't have this scope equipped, and then reattach this scope to fix it.</color> QMK-152 is a 3x white light scope produced in China, often used in conjunction with the QBZ-191 assault rifle.
